intro.description: This task is focused on the adaptation and creation of new roles in the organization due to the new business model. It is essential to define the roles and responsibilities within the organisation in order to cover all the activities created with the new business model. If new roles are necessary, these roles should have assigned activities and responsibilities, and those should be known by the people involved.

item.title: RAP.A1 - Define the new roles
item.description: This activity is in charge to identify which are the activities and responsibilities of the new roles and the required skills for carrying out these activities.

item.title: RAP.A2 - Modify the existing roles
item.description: The objective of this activity is to change the existing roles with the required changes to be aligned with the new business model.

item.title: RAP.A3 – Train people
item.description: During this activity, requirements for new skills should be collected. The new skills will be looked for them in the organization. It is necessary to prepare a training plan and to train to those people who are going to be assigned to the new or modified roles

item.title: RAP.A4 - Communicate the affected people their new activities and responsibilities
item.description: The objective of this activity is to ensure that all the people affected by the changes have the enough information to carry out their new responsibilities in an appropriate way.

item.title: RAP.A5 - Communicate the entire organisation the new and modified roles
item.description: The objective of this activity is to ensure that all the people in the organization know the changes on the organization chart
